root: ^This is Luke. He is one of your high school friends, and also lives in the same street as you.
^I knew saving some of the lunch money my parents gave me would be the key to S U C E S S!!

Begin: ^Did you really skipped lunch for this?
SkipLunch: ^YOU BET I DID. All I had to do was to eat chips a couple days during the past 2 weeks and voila, money to invest in my future!
Good4u: ^I SAID I will BUY you a FREAKING house in CALIFORNIA, BABY
